title: Announcement, Continuum, 1990
signed: Signaure imprinted in green ink, verso, center, left enclosed in abstract embellishment: DESIGN:/ EDWARD/ FELLA/ Q & X
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in green across upper edge: Reception: Friday, OCT 12TH, from 5:30-8:30 pm/ Oct 12-Nov 10th 990; across upper left edge, running downward, sideways: CONTINUUM; across upper half of sheet: AVERY BOONE/ JAMES H. DOZIER/... [lists participatng artists]... ESDRAS M. SANTIAGO; center, left: CURATORS/ GILDA Snowden/ LESTER/ Johnson; across lower left quadrant: DETROIT/ FOCUS GALLERY; across lower right quadrant: 643 Beaubien 3rd fl/ DETROIT, MI 48226/ tel. 313 962-9025/ hrs. WED-SAT, 12-6p.m.
Verso: Imprinted in green, scattered across center enclosed in abstract embellishments: OPENING/ ALSO IN THE AREA/ DETROIT ARTISTS MARKET/ ANNUAL FALL ALL MEDIA/ EXHIBITION/ WITH SUPPORT FROM/ THE/ MICHIGAN/ COUNCIL FOR THE ARTS/ DETROIT COUNCIL OF THE ARTS/ EQUAL OPPORTUNITY/ MEMBER ORGANIZATION/ OF NAAO; scattered across lower third of sheet enclosed in abstract embellishments: ACROSS FROM THE BRICKTOWN PEOPLE/ MOVER/ STATION/ 743 BEAUBIEN/ DETROIT, MICHIGAN/ 48226/ ETROIT/ FOCUS/ GALLERY/ NON-PROFIT/ ORG/ BULK RATE/ US. POSTAGE/ PAUD/ DETROIT MICH/ PERMIT NO 2960
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in green for Detroit Focus Gallery exhibiton, designed to be mailed.  [Printed] hand-lettered text in a variety of sizes, styles, throughout. 
Recto:  Across upper half of sheet, text giving title, dates, participating artists, reception, and additional information.  Across lower half of sheet, text giving location and contact information.    
Verso: Upper right quadrant, abstract doodle.  Scattered across sheet, text enclosed by abstract embellishments, giving sponsors, mailing, and additional information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Continuum, 1990. Offset lithograph on white paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-44
